description: This file is a Python script that sets up an environment for analyzing images to identify geographic locations. It imports necessary modules, loads environment variables, defines a detailed query for geographic analysis, initializes an agent with specific tools, and contains a function to process images and return location information.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class used to run tasks with specified models and tools.

classes.name: Image
classes.description: A class representing an image, used as input for analysis.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: A model class used for geographic analysis.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: A tool class for performing searches via DuckDuckGo.

methods.name: analyze_image
methods.description: Analyzes a given image file to determine geographic location based on visual clues.
